item.title: [SPARK-8606] Exceptions in RDD.getPreferredLocations() and getPartitions() should not be able to crash DAGScheduler
item.description:
RDD.getPreferredLocations() and RDD.getPartitions() may throw exceptions but the DAGScheduler does not guard against this, leaving it vulnerable to crashing and stopping the SparkContext if exceptions occur there.

We should fix this by adding more try blocks around these calls in DAGScheduler.
item.summary: Exceptions in RDD.getPreferredLocations() and getPartitions() should not be able to crash DAGScheduler

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
